explanation: The objects that may be involved in completing the task of examining the pencil by the light are the Pencil itself, the KeyChain (which may hold the keys to the lamp), a Book (which may contain information on how to turn on the lamp or provide additional light), an AlarmClock (which may be used to schedule time for completing the task), and a Pen (which can be used for writing notes or drawing while examining the pencil with the lamp light).
